data.text:
@hkfp #HongKong has become a low profile dictatorship. 
https://t.co/SRL67V9Lhx
@hkfp PK’s eunuchs thug like hiding since ancient cave dwellers in a certain xithole
@hkfp Send in the plain clothes police somebody is not wearing a mask outdoors. Dining indoors no problem. Carrie Lam at her pressers also no problem.

@hkfp Why send plain clothes cops to minor incident like this, over the past 3 yrs they’ve proven themselves incapable of de-escalation. Uniform officers are obviously cops, no argument, so ppl comply rather than fight.
@hkfp So embarrassing for Hong Kong. No point to this - at all.
@hkfp Can’t play basketball because of the flu
